name: Soup Simulator (TheoClarke)
description:
~ RACCOON CHEF needs to make a tasty trash soup, quick! ~

~ Collect the correct ingredient and put it into the soup pot ~

~ Use ARROW KEYS to move. Press SPACE to interact ~

~ Put as many ingredients into the soup as you can in 60 seconds ~

Soup Simulator is a super simple cooking game with a twist - all the ingredients are disgusting! Made in 3 hours for Trijam #154  game jam. I made the game in Construct 3, the art in Photoshop and music with Chrome Music Lab. I also used some free sound effects.
